settings.heading: Shipping policy
settings.content:
Free Shipping 

In Canada, we offer free standard shipping for orders over $49.
In EU countries, we offer free standard shipping for orders over €80.
In UK, we offer free standard shipping for orders over £60.

For orders under this amount, shipping is calculated at checkout.

Shipping within Canada

Our fulfillment center is open from 9 am to 5 pm, Monday through Friday.

Your order will be dispatched within 5-10 business days. Please note that orders placed after 5 pm on Friday will be processed the following Monday.

During the holiday season, please be informed that our fulfillment center will be closed on the following days:

For Christmas: from December 24th to December 26th.

For New Year: December 31st and January 1st. 

We currently offer 3 shipping methods: 

Standard shipping, with free shipping for orders over $49. You can choose whether you prefer to be delivered with or without a signature requirement.

UPS Standard.

UPS Expedited.

For standard shipping, we offer a signature requirement option during checkout. You can choose to require a signature at delivery for extra security, at no extra cost.

In the event that you are unavailable during the delivery, or if our carrier encounters security access issues, your package will be safely delivered to the nearest UPS access point for your convenience. You will have a period of 8 business days to pick up your package. If the package remains unclaimed during this time, it will be returned to our store.

If no signature is chosen, you will be fully responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to your package after delivery. 

You can also choose to notify us regarding your delivery preferences by leaving instructions at checkout. Orders with comment "Leave at door" will be reconsidered without signature service.

If we don't have a selected option from you, we will select signature at delivery as default option, to protect you from porch pirates.

Please note that during the holidays, our delivery times might be extended due to shipping disruptions expected from our carrier.

International Shipping

We now offer international shipping to customers in the United Kingdom (UK) and within Europe. We currently ship to the following European's countries: France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Ireland, Austria, Germany. Please note that we are constantly working to expand our shipping coverage and may add more countries in the future.

The available shipping methods may vary depending on the destination country. The shipping costs for international orders will be calculated based on the destination, the weight and dimensions of the package, and the shipping method chosen. During the checkout process, you will be able to select the available shipping options and the exact shipping cost will be displayed before completing your order.

Please be aware that international orders may be subject to customs fees, import duties, value-added taxes (VAT), or other charges imposed by the destination country. These additional charges are the sole responsibility of the customer.

The estimated delivery timeframes for international orders range from 5 to 15 business days, taken into account the shipping method selected, customs processes, and other external factors. To keep you informed about the progress of your shipment, we provide order tracking services.

Please ensure that you are familiar with your country's import regulations and restrictions before placing an order. We recommend that you check with your local customs office for more information.

Our return policy applies to international orders. However, please note that return shipping costs, as well as any associated duties or taxes, will be the responsibility of the customer. Please refer to our Return Policy for detailed instructions on how to initiate a return or exchange.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding international shipping, please feel free to reach out to our customer support via chat.
